site.title: St John's Park Church
site.subtitle: A community of Jesus-followers in Park, Sheffield.

hero.title: WELCOME TO ST JOHN'S PARK
hero.subtitle: We are a community of Jesus-followers in Park, Sheffield. We belong to the family of God. We love and serve our city. And in everything we do, we give Jesus praise.

mission_grid.title: BELONG
mission_grid.desc: Find transformation, discipleship, and growth through midweek groups, Kids, and Youth communities.

mission_grid.title: SERVE
mission_grid.desc: Join one of our teams and help our church family thrive in worship, welcome, and community service.

mission_grid.title: GIVE
mission_grid.desc: Your generosity helps sustain Sunday gatherings, midweek ministries, and practical support across our city.

sundays.location: St John's Park, Bernard Street, Sheffield, S2 5PU
sundays.description: Join us for our Sunday gathering every week at 10:45am. We gather to worship Jesus, hear the Bible read and explained, and to pray.
sundays.service_style: Our Sunday gathering is informal and interactive, with contemporary worship songs.
sundays.kids_blurb: We have Kids and Youth groups (0-14) that meet during our service.
sundays.after_service: Please join us for refreshments afterwards to hang out as church family.
